gloss: bound, enclose, separate from, mark the limit of

fullGloss: to watch (over), guard, heed; to look (at), gaze, observe
after (of time), following; before (in all relations but time)

notes: The possessive suffix 'mma' is effectively inserted in the middle of the locative case ending 'ssen'.

fullGloss: beautiful (of sound), sweet, melodious; soft, gentle, light
(state of) mind, (inner) thought, mood; will, resolve

notes: VT43:33: derived from a prepositional element 'ata-' ('across, over, lying from side to side') plus allative ending '-r'

fullGloss: depart, disappear, go away, be lost
have as object[ive], (in)tend, proceed, make for, go towards

notes: The form in 'twenty years have flown away' seems to be an error for palantírienye, corrected by Tolkien in version C of the text.
